channel.title: MajorGeeks.Com
channel.description: MajorGeeks offers only 4-star or better geek-tested and reviewed software for Windows along with tutorials and videos when you need help with your computer.

item.title: Endless Sky 32-Bit 0.10.2
item.description: Endless Sky is a fantastic action-packed Open Source 2D space trading game modeled after the popular Escape Velocity RPG series. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10|8|7|Linux|macOS | Size: 252 MB ]

item.title: Endless Sky 64 Bit 0.10.2
item.description: Endless Sky is a fantastic action-packed Open Source 2D space trading game modeled after the popular Escape Velocity RPG series. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10|8|7|Linux|macOS | Size: 252 MB ]

item.title: RestoreWindowPos 0.14.0
item.description: RestoreWindowPos is designed to help keep windows in place after disconnecting/connecting a monitor. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10 | Size: 14 MB ]

item.title: DFX WinTweaks 2.4.1
item.description: DFX WinTweaks is a versatile and compact tool that provides system information and allows users to customize their operating system beyond the limitations set by Microsoft. DFX WinTweaks is specifically created to provide you with access to important system settings that can be adjusted as needed. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 137 KB ]

item.title: WinDynamicDesktop 5.3.0
item.description: WinDynamicDesktop brings the Dynamic Desktop feature over from macOS Mojave to Windows 10, uses your location to set sunrise and sunset times, and changes your desktop wallpaper accordingly. We opted to manually enter our information during testing and used the default images provided. Set up was a breeze and almost immediately set the desktop wallpaper to the image selected. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10 | Size: 71-82 MB ]

item.title: LinearMouse 0.9.2
item.description: LinearMouse offers macOS users customized scrolling direction, scrolling acceleration, cursor acceleration, and cursor sensitivity. It also makes the back and forward buttons universal. [License: Open Source | Requires: macOS | Size: 3 MB ]

item.title: qBittorrent 64-Bit 4.5.4
item.description: qBittorrent is a BitTorrent client that aims to be a superior alternative to other BitTorrent clients. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10|8|7|Linux|macOS | Size: 32 MB ]

item.title: CTrayNotifyIcon 1.76
item.description: CTrayNotifyIcon is a free MFC/WTL (Microsoft Foundation Class/Windows Template Library) class app for creating and testing tray icon functionality. CTrayNotifyIcon allows you to fully test the behavior of newly created system tray icons. The class hides a lot of the drudgery of calling the API directly and provides a nice clean C++ interface. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 88 KB ]

item.title: AnyTXT Searcher 1.3.1143
item.description: AnyTXT Searcher is a search utility that is designed to help expedite performing targeted searches inside of documents. It is a straightforward but powerful local data full-text search engine that can be utilized as a desktop search application enabling you to find a specific file rapidly. AnyTXT Searcher will come in handy when you need to find a particular file, and search by name has failed, for instance. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 82 MB ]

item.title: LogViewPlus 3.0.18 Beta / 3.0.16
item.description: LogViewPlus will quickly parse, read, and analyze log files making it superior to utilizing a simple text editor. LogViewPlus is similar to Grep and Tail but is designed specifically for Windows. Built with reading application log files in mind, LogViewPlus is intended to be a full-service utility that includes multiple filtering/analysis tools and more. [License: Shareware $45.00+ | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 35 MB ]

item.title: WinPaletter 1.0.7.8 Beta / 1.0.7.6
item.description: WinPaletter enables you to colorize Windows 10 and 11 accents without restrictions from an easy-to-use interface. Personalization of your Windows machine is made easy with WinPaletter; it provides you with the ability to change almost every aspect of the way your desktop appears. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10 | Size: 9 MB ]

item.title: Workrave 1.11.0 Beta 5 / 1.10.51.1
item.description: Workrave is a program that assists in recovering and preventing Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI). The program frequently alerts you to take micro-pauses, and rest breaks and restricts you to your daily limit. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7|Linux | Size: 9-48 MB ]

item.title: Argus Monitor 6.2.4.2673
item.description: Argus Monitor quietly runs as a background task constantly monitoring the health status of your hard disks. [License: Shareware $11.90 | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 12 MB ]

item.title: 7-Zip ZS 22.01 - v1.5.5 - Release 3
item.description: 7-Zip ZS is a lightweight compression tool designed for creating, decompressing, and testing of data integrity as well as performing hash checks for archived files. It comes packed with a real-time compression algorithm for providing high compression ratios. 7-Zip ZS offers an extensive range of compression/speed trade-offs while being backed by a high-speed decoder. It supports mostly all of the popular formats, including IP, RAR, LZA, ARJ, TAR. GZ, ISO, and more. [License: Open Source | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 3 MB ]

item.title: TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 11 4.7.5 Plus! / 2.5.0
item.description: TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 11 is designed to help users explore the hidden settings in Windows 11. weakNow WinSecret for Windows 11 makes the process easier than directly doing it in Regedit, potentially creating critical problems for a novice user. TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 11 gives you a smooth platform to perform these tweaks in a more controlled environment. [License: Freeware / Shareware $8.99 (Plus!) | Requires: 11 | Size: 23 MB ]

item.title: TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 10 4.7.5 Plus! / 2.5.0
item.description: TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 10 allows users to explore the hidden settings in Windows 10. TweakNow WinSecret for Windows 10 is a solid option for those that want to improve their overall experience while on Windows 10 through a simple and easy-to-navigate app. [License: Freeware / Shareware $8.99 (Plus!) | Requires: 10 | Size: 23 MB ]

item.title: Notepad++ 8.5.4
item.description: Notepad++ is a free source code editor that includes support for several programming languages. This utility is written in C++ and uses pure Win32 API and STL which ensures a higher execution speed and smaller program size. It can also be utilized as a regular text editor making it a well-rounded app. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: Size Varies ]

item.title: STANDARD Codecs Portable 64-Bit 17.3.7
item.description: STANDARD Codecs Portable 64-Bit is a free audio and video codec package containing the LAV filters and VSFilter for subtitles. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 17 MB ]

item.title: ADVANCED Codecs Portable 64-Bit 17.3.7
item.description: ADVANCED Codecs Portable 64-Bit is the portable, 64-Bit version of the popular free audio and video codec package. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7 | Size: 25 MB ]

item.title: Trend Micro Check for Chrome, WhatsApp, and Messenger 27.0.0.254
item.description: Trend Micro Check is a free extension for Google Chrome to protect you from malicious websites and block ads. Once you visit a website, click the extension icon (jigsaw puzzle) to see details, including if a website is safe (you can also report a website), how many ads were blocked, and you can send feedback if the results were helpful. [License: Freeware | Requires: 11|10|8|7|Linux|macOS | Size: Size Varies ]
